/input/molecule/n_atoms.description: number of atoms in the systems

/input/aobasis/1/n_shells.description: number of shells in this basis set

/input/aobasis/1/center.description: for each shell: coordinates of basis function center

/input/aobasis/1/orbmom.description: for each shell: angular momentum (s=0, p=1, d=2, etc.)

/input/aobasis/1/n_prim.description: for each shell: number of primitive functions

/input/aobasis/1/n_cont.description: for each shell: number of contracted functions

/input/aobasis/1/exponents.description: exponential parameters of the Gaussian primitive functions (1-d array of length sum(n_prim))

/input/aobasis/1/contractions.description: contraction coefficients for the contracted Gaussian functions (length sum(n_prim *_n_cont), stored as 1-d array)

/result/mobasis.description: molecular orbitals obtained in this calculation

/result/mobasis/1.description: molecular orbitals obtained in this calculation
/result/mobasis/1.label: /result/mobasis

/result/mobasis/1/n_basis.description: size of the basis to which the MO coefficients refer (usually identical to n_ao in the aobasis definition)

/result/mobasis/1/n_mo.description: dimension of the mo-basis (number of orbitals)

/result/mobasis/1/n_po.description: for 4-component calculation: number of "positronic" orbitals (n_po < n_mo)

/result/mobasis/1/nz.description: algebra that is used for the coefficients (1:real, 2: complex, 4:quaternion)

/result/mobasis/1/orbitals.description: mo-coefficients that define the mo's in the given basis

/result/mobasis/1/eigenvalues.description: for each molecular orbital: orbital energy

/result/mobasis/1/occupations.description: for each molecular orbital: orbital occupation (1.0 fully occupied, 0.0 empty)

/result/mobasis/1/shell_id.description: for each molecular orbital: shell (-1: closed, 0: virtual, 1: open shell

/result/mobasis/1/aobasis_id.description: pointer to the explicit definition of the aobasis in which these MOs are expressed
